languages.text: "Наши дети замерзают! Нас наказывают без вины!"
"Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"
languages.original_text: "Наши дети замерзают! Нас наказывают без вины!"

traits.locale_text: "Our children are freezing! We're done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"
"Our children are freezing! We're done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"
"Our children are freezing! We're done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"
"Our children are freezing! We're done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

languages.text: “我们的孩子正在挨冻！我们什么都没做错，可我们却遭到了惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的孩子正在挨冻！我们什么都没做错，可我们却遭到了惩罚！”

languages.text: «¡Nuestros hijos se hielan! ¡No hemos hecho nada malo y nos castigan!».
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Nuestros hijos se hielan! ¡No hemos hecho nada malo y nos castigan!».

languages.text: 「子供たちが凍えている！私たちは何も悪いことをしていないのに、罰を受けている！」
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: 「子供たちが凍えている！私たちは何も悪いことをしていないのに、罰を受けている！」

languages.text: "Unsere Kinder erfrieren! Wir haben nichts getan und werden doch bestraft!"
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Kinder erfrieren! Wir haben nichts getan und werden doch bestraft!"

languages.text: « Nos enfants meurent de froid ! On nous punit alors qu'on a rien fait de mal ! »
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: « Nos enfants meurent de froid ! On nous punit alors qu'on a rien fait de mal ! »

languages.text: "Çocuklarımız donuyor burada! Bir suçumuz yok ama ceza çeken biziz!"
languages.original_text: "Our children are freezing! We've done nothing wrong, and we're being punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Çocuklarımız donuyor burada! Bir suçumuz yok ama cezayı çeken biziz!"
